title: can't enter authorisation code to add FileLink Provider for Dropbox
content:
On downloading the FileLink Provider for Dropbox add-on this message appears:

Dropbox

Authorisation required!

1. Click this link to visit the Dropbox website and authorise this app. 2. Paste your code: 3. Save

The link takes me to https://www.dropbox.com/1/oauth2/authorize_submit where it says "Enter this code into Thunderbird CloudFile to finish the process" and a 43 character code is provided. However when I paste this code in the box and press Save Thunderbird says "Authorisation attempt unsuccessful".

Please help!
creator: k.fryde

title: Installing the new version of Thunderbird
content:
Hi, I have now Thunderbird 102.13.0 (64). When I install the new version it comes up with: AVAILABLE CONFIGURATION Incoming POP mail.bigpond.com Outgoing SMTP mail.bigpond.com

But I have at present: Incoming IMAP Mail Server Server name imap.telstra.com

Outgoing Server (SMTP) Telstra Mail - smtp.telstra.com (Default)

If I attempt to configure manually with my details It finds them wrong? Can you help? Regards Ilio Pieroni
creator: Iliopier

title: Two Junk And Trash Folders Displayed (GMail) after upgrading to Thunderbird 115
content:
After upgrading to Thunderbird 115, 2 spam folders (1 labelled Junk and the other Spam) and 2 Trash folders are displayed in my private GMail account.

In my Google Workspace account, 2 Trash folders (1 Bin and 1 Trash) are displayed.

Kindly advise how to fix.
creator: vivek_suraiya

title: Set up your existing email address
content:
Set up your existing email address will not work. Thunderbird stopped working no outgoing no incoming. Deleted account then downloaded new Thunderbird. Entering correct name, correct email address and password (also tried with no password) finds set up on Mozilla ISP sever. Select 'Done' brings up message "Cannot log in to server.Probably wrong configuration, username or password".

This unsolvable for me now as I have tried everything I know and suggested in Help.
creator: Kemet

title: Locked out of Thunderbird.
content: How can I get into Thunderbird, when it will not recognise any of the primary passwords that I thought I might have used. I need to see what my primary password is, so that I can change it, and then get back into Thunderbird. I have not been able to access my e mails and have lost hours in trying. I am not a happy bunny...Grrrrr.
creator: wardswillowmist

title: Thunderbird 115.0 (64 bit) - unable to send emails to Outlook.com
content:
As of version 115.0 for 64bit, I am unable to send emails to Outlook.com. An error occurs saying:

Send Message Error Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to the Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again.

There are no issues sending emails to Outlook.com using a different mail client.
creator: avennonen

title: password
content: i don't have a password for the email address i want to use to create a Thunderbird account.
creator: marksguy3

title: Thunderbird display and screen size
content:
Hi This morning I was blessed with update 115 for Thunderbird. Not impressed. I have a couple of issues I hope you can help with.

1. The box that lists incoming messages is way too long, taking up over half the screen. I moved it up as small as it will let me. 2. The second question is the box in between inbox and the message (middle pane) is also way too large. Ideally, I would only like it to display the top line. Remove the to and subject line The attached screen shot hopefully will help you see the issue. Please note that on the bottom of the shot is probably 3/4 way down my screen with very little room to read the message. Perhaps 3 or 4 lines at best.
creator: kliner

title: Unified Folders have some account folders listed under Unified > Inbox > <some account>
content: Hello, I recently upgraded to Thunderbird 115.0. I am noticing an issue with a few of my email accounts in the Unified Folders where the folders (draft, sent, junk, trash, etc) are under the inbox. Is this a bug, as I do not recall other versions of Thunderbird showing the folders in this way. I included a screenshot.
creator: jasonmswartz

title: Duplicate message filter
content:
I am on MAC OS Ventura 13.4. My Thunderbird is 102.13.0.

Recently, one of the message filters for a specific user name was duplicated. It contains 146 filters. The duplicate user name filter is found in the filter list just above the "Local Folders" user name.

Whatever I do to one of the duplicate filters, is done to the other. How do I fix this? In this case, the user name is dmoss@hebrewcatholic.org. There are two of these in the list of message filters.
creator: david586

title: S/MIME signing for each email alias
content: I am curious on how to setup S/MIME signing on a per alias level. Currently, I don't see an option in the Thunderbird client to do this...
creator: onlineuser

title: TB 115, Much ado about nothing
content: I became excited about the hype. I downloaded 115 and ran it. Two things I immediately noticed, one is the icon is different, and the other is that the UI looks almost exactly, but not quite, like the old UI. Not that this is bad, I use TB everyday on my Mac and it is my email client. But first impressions were underwhelming especially after the hype. One thing I noticed that's an improvement is that TB now recognized my Mac address book so I no longer need Card Book. Other than that it's much ado about nothing.
creator: chunnel

title: Preview Pane turns itself on
content:
Hi, I'm using the latest Thunderbird 115.0 on Windows 11 and use the program with the Preview Pane turned off all the time.

Since I installed 115, when new mail comes in and I click on the notification banner, it brings me into Thunderbird and turns the preview pane back on.

Thanks

Frank Woolf
creator: fkw1122

title: Corrupted incoming emails
content:
I am having problems with some, but not all, incoming messages on one of my computers. The messages appear correctly on other computers.

Some messages appear only in html format.

Other messages have the header but there is nothing in the content part of the message.

Other message have the correct heading but the content is from messages received LATER, this can be two or three emails in a row have the content from a later email.
creator: sprung
